p:
The SAF PTCs suggest a different relationship with regional warming. The summer SAF PTCs’ dependence on regional warming (Fig. 5d) resembles a ‘U-shape’—large PTCs in regions of small and large warming. Since regions that warm most in summer also warm most in fall/winter (Fig. 2), this suggests that the regional warming pattern itself is partially independent of the SAF, also supported by Kim et al.
34 .
